caption_original:
Investments in green infrastructure contribute to communities that are healthy and productive places to live. They also protect our communities and play an important role in supporting Canada’s ongoing transition to a clean growth economy. 
How, where, and what we invest in can have significant benefits for the environment and our health. What does green infrastructure mean to you? We want to hear your ideas for action.
By taking as little as two minutes to complete any of the activities listed at the link below you will be helping the Government of Canada build a better future for all of us! 
http://www.infraconsults.ca/green
caption_cleaned: Investments in green infrastructure contribute to communities that are healthy and productive places to live. They also protect our communities and play an important role in supporting Canada’s ongoing transition to a clean growth economy. How, where, and what we invest in can have significant benefits for the environment and our health. What does green infrastructure mean to you? We want to hear your ideas for action. By taking as little as two minutes to complete any of the activities listed at the link below you will be helping the Government of Canada build a better future for all of us!

caption_original: The NASA - National Aeronautics and Space Administration Juno spacecraft arrives at Jupiter – but your drone should not. More info: www.Canada.ca/drone-safety
